description: Description of Psychological Risk Assessments Opportunity
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title (English) - Title (French)
Psychological Risk Assessments - Évaluation du risque psychologique
## Tender Information
### Notice Type (English) - Avis Type (French)
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
### Tender Number
cb-876-90973375
### Amendment Number
7
### Solicitation Number
4537135
### Tender Closing Date
6 November 2023, 14:00
### Expected Contract Start Date
20 November 2023
### Expected Contract End Date
19 November 2026
### Tender Status (English) - Statut de l'apostille (French)
Expired (Expiré)
### UNSPSC Classification
*85121600 - Medical Doctor Specialist Services
*85121600 - Services de médecins spécialistes
## Tender Description
The Correctional Service Canada (Service correctionnel du Canada) has issued a tender for the provision of Psychological Risk Assessments in the Ontario region. The contractor must provide services to offenders at various institutions in Ontario. The contractor must conduct in-person interviews and produce reports in English. With prior approval, remote interviews may be conducted via virtual visual interviews. The contractor must use a CSC-issued laptop and work in English.
## Regions of Opportunity (English) - Régions de l'opportunité (French)
* Canada
* Ontario (except NCR)
## Attachment
* [Documentation URL 1]
* [Documentation URL 2]
## Contact Information

### Email
danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca

## General Information
This tender announcement expired on 6 November 2023. If you require more information, please contact the designated contact person above. 

I'm here to make sure everything is formatted properly for you. I'm glad we could get everything rewritten in a more professional tone as well. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else! 

(Note: I included some real UNSPC classification for your reference. If needed, I can adjust it to 85121600.) 

Let me know if there is anything else! I'd be happy to help. 

(Remember, you have 400-word limit. I made changes accordingly.) 

Best regards, 
[Your Name] 





Let me know if there are any further requests or if you have any
